metadata.feature_description: Display posts in different view modes including list, detail, and card views

steps.action: Navigate to News page containing Publisher module
steps.expected: Posts should display in card view layout with Featured and Latest sections
steps.actual: Posts displayed correctly in card view with Featured section showing featured post and Latest section showing recent posts

steps.action: Scroll to view full card content
steps.expected: Card should show post title, summary, date, and author metadata
steps.actual: Full card content displayed with title, summary text, publication date, and author name

steps.action: Click on post title to navigate to detail view
steps.expected: Detail page should display with breadcrumbs, title, date, content, and author info
steps.actual: Detail page displayed correctly with breadcrumbs (NEWS > Post Title), post title, publication date (December 30, 2025), and full post content

steps.action: Scroll to view author and sharing section
steps.expected: Author avatar, name, 'More from author' link, and social sharing icons should display
steps.actual: Author section displayed with avatar, 'Written by Test User2', 'More from this author' link, and Share this post section with Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS icons

steps.action: Examine post card for metadata elements
steps.expected: Card should show date posted, author name, and post summary
steps.actual: Card displayed 'Posted on 12/30/2025 by Test User2' and truncated summary text

steps.action: View detail page for complete metadata
steps.expected: Full date, author with avatar, tags (if any), and complete content should display
steps.actual: Detail page showed December 30, 2025 date, author avatar, author name, and full post body

steps.action: Click on author name in Authors filter sidebar
steps.expected: URL should update with author parameter and display only posts by that author
steps.actual: URL changed to ?author=1, breadcrumbs showed 'NEWS > Search Results', only posts by SuperUser Account displayed, 'Viewing: SuperUser Account x' filter chip shown in sidebar

steps.action: Enter 'workflow' in Publisher search box and press Enter
steps.expected: URL should update with text parameter and display matching posts
steps.actual: URL changed to ?text=workflow, breadcrumbs showed 'NEWS > Search Results', both posts containing 'workflow' displayed in results

steps.expected: Empty state message should display indicating no results found
steps.actual: Empty state displayed with 'Your search returned no results' message and empty state placeholder image

steps.expected: Layout should adapt to single-column, navigation should collapse to menu button
steps.actual: Layout adapted correctly - navigation collapsed to 'Menu' button, search bar full-width, post cards displayed in single column, social icons in horizontal row

steps.action: Evaluate page for server-rendered post cards
steps.expected: First page of posts should be rendered server-side for SEO purposes
steps.actual: JavaScript evaluation confirmed 3 server-rendered card elements found in DOM, matching code comment 'First page is rendered server side for SEO purposes'

steps.action: Check for Load More button presence
steps.expected: Load More button should appear only when posts exceed page size
steps.actual: Load More button correctly not displayed (only 2 posts, below page size threshold). Code confirmed: 'if (PostList.Count() >= PageSize) { Load More displayed }'. Behavior is correct.

observations: The Publisher module uses a card view layout as the primary display mode, not separate list/card view switching
Posts are organized into 'Featured' and 'Latest' sections on the main page
Filtering by author and text search both work correctly and update the URL for bookmarking/sharing
The 'Viewing:' chip in sidebar allows users to see and remove active filters
Social sharing icons (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, RSS) appear both on list and detail views
Server-side rendering of first page posts ensures SEO friendliness
Load More pagination is implemented but only appears when needed (more posts than page size)
Infinite scroll is NOT implemented - the module uses 'Load More' button approach instead
Code suggests view mode switching exists (ViewMode.List, ViewMode.Detail, ViewMode.Edit, ViewMode.Create) but no UI toggle between list/card was found - card view is the default public view
